name: Gate Rusher - Speed Maze Game
description:
Put your timing and reflexes to the test in the most thrilling and addictive running game of 2020: Gate Rusher!

Gate Rusher is a test of timing and precision as you roll through the gates.
Swipe left and right to control the ball and swiftly pass through them all, while the game picks up speed and intensity as you play.
 
See how many gates you can roll through! But don’t lose your focus, or else you’ll crash!

Gather gems as you roll through the gates and see how high you can get your score! This fun and addicting game will keep on challenging you as you aim for higher and higher heights.
 
Gate Rusher requires your full attention and awesome swiping skills to survive the run. Collect all the gems and get a perfect rush!
 
GATE RUSHER FEATURES:
 
SWIPE AND ROLL
- Roll through the gates and swipe to maneuver
- The speed picks up the further you go
- Collect gems and earn points!

HIGH SCORE
- Try to beat your top score
- Aim for a new top distance or to collect the most gems
- How far can you go?

FUN AND ADDICTING GAME
- Play offline – no WiFi required!
- Gate Rusher is fun and easy to learn
- Keep playing until you get a new top score!

SKILL CHALLENGES
- Single level: Start easy and complete each level. The difficulty increases as you progress. Keep your winning streak to set the record!
- Infinite level: Take the ultimate test of your skills, focus and patience! How long can you survive?
 
Download Gate Rusher now and feel the rush!
